author: Reuters Editorial
title: Francia, prezzi consumo finali armonizzati gennaio confermati a -0,1% mese, +1,5% anno Macroeconomia
text: PARIGI, 22 French consumer prices fell 0.1 percent in January, giving a year-on-year inflation rate of 1.5 percent, according to final EU-harmonised data released on Thursday from the INSEE national statistics office. The 12-month rate was in line with a flash estimate of 1.5 percent from INSEE . KEY CPI DATA Index m/m (pct chg) y/y (pct chg) EU-harmonised (HICP) 102.06 -0.1 1.5 National measure 101.75 -0.1 1.3 National measure excl. tobacco 101.67 -0.1 1.3 Core inflation 101.86 0.6 0.9 BACKGROUND French EU-harmonised inflation fell to a historical low of -0.8 percent in July 2009 and hit an all-time high of 4.0 percent in July 2008, according to INSEE's records going back to 1991. GRAPHIC reut.rs/2iwelTX FOR DETAILS FROM INSEE here
